New Records: Zach Neto is the first Angels infielder with a 20-homer, 20-steal season
Key Match Events: Angels end a seven-game losing streak with a 3-0 win over the Detroit Tigers
Jack Kochanowicz pitched six scoreless innings
Zach Neto's two-run home run in the fifth inning helped the Angels take a 3-0 lead
Pre-Game Insights: The Angels had lost 12 of 14 and were 1-8 going into the last game of their trip
Detroit, which had won six straight, left 10 runners on base
Post-Match Reflections: Angels manager Ron Washington expressed pride in Zach Neto's performance
Tigers manager A.J. Hinch said the team had a lot of opportunities but didn't string at-bats together
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked a significant turnaround for the Angels, who had been struggling
Zach Neto's performance was a highlight of the game, as he ended a three-for-26 slump and hit his 20th home run of the season
